section.p:
Once again you find yourself a slave to the masked lords of Uttaku.
Lose the codewords Erebus and Evade
if you had them. Cross off all the money and items you were carrying from your Adventure Sheet; they are gone forever.
You are taken to Aku, city of the Faceless King, and brought before the Master of Minions, a masked noble who decides where slaves will work.
